meanings.definition: A list of items or objects, typically written or printed by hand.
meanings.sent1: I made a handlist of all the groceries we need to buy.
meanings.sent2: She kept a handlist of all the books she wanted to read.
meanings.sent3: The handlist of ingredients for the recipe was so long, it looked like a shopping list.
meanings.sent4: His handlist of goals for the year was as detailed as a treasure map.
meanings.sent5: The handlist of rules was posted on the wall for everyone to see.

meanings.definition: To create a list of items or objects, typically written or printed by hand.
meanings.sent1: I will handlist all the tasks we need to complete this week.
meanings.sent2: She handlists all the names of the attendees for the event.
meanings.sent3: He handlists his favorite movies to watch during the holidays.
meanings.sent4: Handlisting the steps to assemble the furniture felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to handlist their favorite animals for a class project.
